name: Aura of the Champion: Aura of Light

AUjPyjlQFqscsV69.name: Aura of the Champion: Aura of Light

system.description: An unconscious ally with 0 hit points that starts its turn in your aura automatically succeeds on one death saving throw each turn. Once a creature has succeeded on three death saving throws while in your aura, it cannot benefit from this effect until it has finished a long rest.
